subject: Re: Jesus Christ, gang.
author: Misty
full_text:
Thanks Ann. I think going to more compacted files will help us all in 
the long run. We are already back to 72% rather than 96% tho most of 
the file space was being used by someone else besides you =)

I know it gets to be a bit testy around here and the other forums. I 
also know that some of the nastiness can tear apart good working 
relationships as well as friendships. I was just askin Frank if he 
knew if you were still sick or not because you had been very quiet 
lately.

I agree sometimes its good to take a step back rather than get 
yourself caught up in the drama fests going on around us all. Thats 
on and off the board as well. 

As I said I know some of what goes on off of this forum, and I am sad 
to see most of it happening. I just hope everyone can regain focus 
and like you said, remember why we are here.

I hope you feel better soon, and rejoin us when the stress level is 
passed. And I hope it passes soon so ya can run some test sessions 
with the new tool that arrived!

I keep telling people that all the negativity does take a toll, on us 
personally and our working together. 

Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
>
> Get a grip--all of you.
> 
> I'm out of here until all this petty BS and hatred sorts out. The  
> amount of stress that I've been through with all this fighting 
since  
> early this year has really taken a toll on me as a person and a  
> researcher. I'm going off line for awhile. If anyone wants to talk 
to  
> me, send me a private e-mail because I'm going to read only/no e-
mail  
> until I remember again why I used to wake up every day and want to  
> run to my computer to see what would be posted.
> 
> Misty--as per your request, I've deleted my files.
> 
> 
> 
> Ann
>
